categories.label: Connection
categories.description: Needs related to relationships and belonging

categories.label: Physical Well-being
categories.description: Needs related to body and survival

categories.label: Honesty
categories.description: Needs related to truth and authenticity

categories.label: Play
categories.description: Needs related to joy and recreation

categories.label: Peace
categories.description: Needs related to harmony and ease

categories.label: Autonomy
categories.description: Needs related to freedom and choice

categories.label: Meaning
categories.description: Needs related to purpose and contribution

needs.label: Acceptance
needs.description: To be received as we are, without conditions
examples: Being welcomed into a group without having to prove yourself
A friend who doesn't try to change you
reflectionQuestions: Where in my life do I feel most accepted?
How can I offer more acceptance to others?

needs.label: Affection
needs.description: To give and receive expressions of care and warmth
reflectionQuestions: How do I most like to give affection?
How do I most like to receive affection?

needs.label: Appreciation
needs.description: To be valued and recognized for who we are and what we contribute
reflectionQuestions: What do I wish others appreciated about me?
Who could I appreciate more?

needs.label: Belonging
needs.description: To feel part of a community or group
examples: Having a role in a group
reflectionQuestions: Where do I feel I truly belong?
What communities nourish me?

needs.label: Closeness
needs.description: To have intimate connection with others
reflectionQuestions: With whom do I feel closest?
What creates closeness for me?

needs.label: Communication
needs.description: To share and receive information, thoughts, and feelings
reflectionQuestions: What makes communication feel satisfying to me?
Where could I communicate more clearly?

needs.label: Companionship
needs.description: To have others present with us
examples: Having someone to do activities with
reflectionQuestions: Who are my companions in life?
What activities do I enjoy doing with others?

needs.label: Consideration
needs.description: To have our needs, feelings, and situations taken into account
reflectionQuestions: When do I feel most considered?
How can I show more consideration?

needs.label: Empathy
needs.description: To be understood at a deep, emotional level
examples: Someone truly getting how you feel
reflectionQuestions: From whom do I receive empathy?
How well do I offer empathy to others?

needs.label: Inclusion
needs.description: To be invited and welcomed to participate
reflectionQuestions: Where do I feel most included?
Who might I include more?

needs.label: Intimacy
needs.description: Deep closeness and vulnerability with another
reflectionQuestions: What does intimacy mean to me?
How comfortable am I with vulnerability?

needs.label: Love
needs.description: To give and receive deep care and affection
reflectionQuestions: How do I experience love?
How do I express love?

needs.label: Respect
needs.description: To be treated with dignity and regard
reflectionQuestions: What does respect look like to me?
How do I show respect?

needs.label: Safety
needs.description: To feel secure and free from harm
reflectionQuestions: Where do I feel safest?
What helps me feel more secure?

needs.label: Sustenance
needs.description: To have adequate food and water
reflectionQuestions: How well am I nourishing my body?
What foods help me thrive?

needs.label: Rest
needs.description: To have adequate sleep and relaxation
reflectionQuestions: Am I getting enough rest?
What helps me truly relax?

needs.label: Shelter
needs.description: To have protection from elements and a place to live
reflectionQuestions: How does my living space support me?
What would make my home more nurturing?

needs.label: Touch
needs.description: To have physical contact with others
reflectionQuestions: How important is physical touch to me?
How do I get my touch needs met?

needs.label: Movement
needs.description: To move our bodies and exercise
reflectionQuestions: What kind of movement brings me joy?
How does my body feel when I move?

needs.label: Authenticity
needs.description: To be true to ourselves
reflectionQuestions: Where am I most authentic?
What parts of myself do I hide?

needs.label: Integrity
needs.description: To act in alignment with our values
reflectionQuestions: Am I living in alignment with my values?
Where might I be out of integrity?

needs.label: Presence
needs.description: To be fully present and attentive
reflectionQuestions: How present am I in my daily life?
What pulls me out of presence?

needs.label: Joy
needs.description: To experience happiness and delight
reflectionQuestions: What brings me joy?
How often do I allow myself to feel joy?

needs.label: Humor
needs.description: To laugh and experience lightness
reflectionQuestions: What makes me laugh?
How much humor is in my daily life?

needs.label: Play
needs.description: To engage in activities for their own sake
reflectionQuestions: What does play look like for me?
Am I getting enough play in my life?

needs.label: Beauty
needs.description: To experience and appreciate aesthetic pleasure
reflectionQuestions: What beauty nourishes me?
How can I bring more beauty into my life?

needs.label: Ease
needs.description: To have things flow without struggle
reflectionQuestions: Where is there ease in my life?
What creates unnecessary struggle?

needs.label: Harmony
needs.description: To have balance and peaceful coexistence
reflectionQuestions: Where is there harmony in my life?
What disrupts my sense of harmony?

needs.label: Order
needs.description: To have structure and organization
reflectionQuestions: How important is order to me?
What level of order do I need?

needs.label: Space
needs.description: To have room, physical and emotional
reflectionQuestions: Am I getting enough space?
How do I create space for myself?

needs.label: Autonomy
needs.description: To have freedom to choose and act
reflectionQuestions: Where do I have autonomy?
Where do I feel constrained?

needs.label: Choice
needs.description: To have options and the power to select among them
reflectionQuestions: Do I feel I have choices in my life?
Where could I create more choice?

needs.label: Freedom
needs.description: To be unrestricted in action and thought
reflectionQuestions: Where do I feel most free?
What limits my sense of freedom?

needs.label: Independence
needs.description: To be self-reliant and not dependent on others
reflectionQuestions: How independent do I want to be?
Where do I need more support?

needs.label: Contribution
needs.description: To give and make a difference
reflectionQuestions: How am I contributing to others?
What contribution feels most meaningful?

needs.label: Creativity
needs.description: To express ourselves and bring new things into being
reflectionQuestions: How do I express my creativity?
What would I like to create?

needs.label: Growth
needs.description: To develop, learn, and improve
reflectionQuestions: How am I growing?
What areas would I like to develop?

needs.label: Understanding
needs.description: To comprehend and make sense of things
reflectionQuestions: What do I want to understand better?
How do I best learn?

needs.label: Purpose
needs.description: To have direction and meaning in life
reflectionQuestions: What gives my life purpose?
What would make my life more meaningful?

needs.label: Competence
needs.description: To feel capable and effective
reflectionQuestions: Where do I feel most competent?
What skills would I like to develop?

needs.label: Challenge
needs.description: To be stretched and tested
reflectionQuestions: Am I being challenged enough?
What challenges would help me grow?
